website_summaries.verdict: Portable and secure hardware wallet. Supports the FIDO Universal Second Factor authentication.
pros: Easy to set up and use
cons: Limited to using four crypto currency wallets at a time

customer_reviews.title: Good Hard wallet for security
customer_reviews.text: Pro -- Easy to use and safely store you cryptocurrency. Cons- 1. already one broke after 1 year 2. not enough memory to hold more than 4 cryptocurrency average. 3. restoring seed is tedious.
customer_reviews.author: Caveat emptor

customer_reviews.title: Ledger Nano S - The S stands for SUCKS!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ledger Nano S - The S stands for SUCKS!!!!!!!! Waste of $59.00 - can only store 3 currencies. Menu interface from the 1980's. I smashed mine with a sledge hammer DUE TO frustration. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!! Never BUYING from Ledger again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated, time consuming and limited coin apps and  storage
customer_reviews.text: If this is an examp-le of modern technology then I'm going back to windows 3.1. There is nothing about this product that the average person would find useful unless you only have Bitcoins. Nowhere in its sales information does it state you have to have different coin apps installed for different crypto coins. Problem is that the Nano S can only store 3 Apps if they are availlable, very limited coin apps for the Nano S. Very unsatisfactory product. Newer simplier products are on the horizon.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Stinson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This thing is horrible. I've wasted SO much time with this. It gets stuck on the Ledger Live Connect your device page and won't connect me to Stellar. I'd never trust this with my crypto in a million years.
customer_reviews.author: nosnow99

customer_reviews.title: Complete crap
customer_reviews.text: Headline too harsh you say? Not as harsh as trying for a month to get this thing to work doing everything that I could find in instructions, forums, Reddit, Youtube, etc. Nothing like working for 4.5 hours and taking that hard earned money just to pound it up my jackhole. This thing is garbage and that is where it ended up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work right.
customer_reviews.text: While navigating through the apps the ledger kept shutting off, every time I would have to re-enter my login code. It was annoying. I was sick and by the time I tried to return it my deadline to return was done. I basically gave away money, dysfunctional ledger s on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: SANZEi

customer_reviews.title: Buy directly from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived unsealed which means it is vulnerable to hacking. Buy directly from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous_Contributor

customer_reviews.title: They don't have a good windows interface and Exodus does nto work with their product
customer_reviews.text: No easy way to get the value of your crypto as there is no windows interface for it! Trezor works with Exodus so you can easily see the value of your crypto and easily use it with Windows. Awful that most hardware wallets do not consider this factor. Get a Trezor so you can track your values easily! I regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin G

customer_reviews.title: Product Was Previously Used! Finger Print on screen!
customer_reviews.text: Sold as a "New" ledger but upon opening the product noticed it was tampered with including an obvious shrink rewrapping. Must return item since its not safe to use now knowing someone may have stolen the private keys!! Should have known better and just bought directly from ledgers site...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: Great Crypto Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great Crypto wallet being used for storing all of my currencies
customer_reviews.author: EvilTwin316

customer_reviews.title: Ledger - easy to use, yet quick to break
customer_reviews.text: Ledger is probably one of the largest companies that makes cold storage wallets for crypto. While the Nano S is easy to use, I must rate it low because it broke after less than 3 months of use. I'm only giving it 3 stars because the manufacturer (Ledger) in France is nice enough to replace the device and pay for the return shipping. I would recommend buying the Nano X or a different ledger. Save your money, this one isn't too great (in terms of its design and longevity).
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: Be crypto-secure!
customer_reviews.text: Doing anything new with crypto can be a little scary to not make a wrong step but these were understandable to use as advertised. Crypto now safer offline & off exchange. Use it!! XRP 🚀🌙 2019!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken...Sellers Uncooperative
customer_reviews.text: I requested a replacement of this very sensitive piece of financial technology when the left navigation button malfunctioned. The seller refused to allow me to keep the defective ledger locked away, with thousands of dollars of cryptocurrency keys trapped inside, instead, insisted I return the ledger to them completely ignoring the sensitivity of the issue ....and CHARGED ME FOR THE REPLACEMENT. so effectively I paid twice as much for one nano ledger that works and one that’s defective. I am very dissatisfied with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Silvia

customer_reviews.title: No storage space!!!! Ahhh!!
customer_reviews.text: The low score has nothing to do with the security and ease of use of this device. I love how easy it is to use and the high amount of security provided. The low score is due to the lack of storage space on the wallet. I was only able to download 4 crypto apps to the device to store my coins. At $50 there should be much more storage space. I was highly disappointed by this. If you're looking to hodl many different types of cryptos you'll need several of these or upgrade to nano x where I'm sure we'd also be disappointed by the lack of storage space.
customer_reviews.author: DangerWillRobinson

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Its best to not leave your assets on exchanges, this is one way to make that happen.
customer_reviews.author: Randy W

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about 30 mins!
customer_reviews.text: I received a faulty Nano S, and from what I have read it has happened to more than a few people. It functioned long enough for me to write down, confirm the seed phrase, load ledger Live, make a small test transfer....then in the middle of use, the screen goes blank. LOL, of course. I tried using 3 other (confirmed working) USB cords...no luck. Yes, I can get a new one at no cost, but will remain unconvinced about its quality and long term reliability.
customer_reviews.author: H.Monty

customer_reviews.title: Possible tampering
customer_reviews.text: A bent up box and only one recovery card?? ALL the unboxing videos I seen had 3 recovery cards. Plus the cars in side were scuffed up and the usb charger had a thumb print on it? I'm not sure if mine has been tampered with or not?? How do I verify this??
customer_reviews.author: Nathan907

customer_reviews.title: User unfriendly interface
customer_reviews.text: Where is the zero star option? How many stars do you give a product that costs a Sunday morning installing, reinstalling, only to be rewarded with the error message “something went wrong “ with no option other than “retry”. I paid the fee to Coinbase to move my BTC but I was unable to transfer it to Ledger. Maybe I’ll get my money back for this device (not sure about that) but I’m pretty sure nobody is giving me my Coinbase fees back.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Felts

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: Second time I get used item. Very dissapointing. I am paying full price for a new item not repackaged. Even the cables were undone in box.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L Tarango-Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: Poor Directions!
customer_reviews.text: This device may be the hard wallet that people need but the directions for using it are terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Bitcoin
customer_reviews.text: truck cookie phatom hoes washer horse river asphalt vagina bacon space beer flat kick goulash rock ship dock light lock fire pot wheel plastic
customer_reviews.author: MicDun

customer_reviews.title: Not sercure
customer_reviews.text: when I bought this product I though the crypto that I put in it was save. so to my surprise on 11/6 2019 all my XRP was gone. Cleared out I Didn't share my passwords or any of that it needs better security.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend purchasing this device from Amazon. I received a brand new nano S and was unable to establish an initial 24 word recovery phrase. I’ve been trying to 12 word recovery phrase and that also was not accepted by the nano s. Keep in mind, I was not trying to match a previously existing phrase but establish a brand new phrase on a brand new device. There is essentially no customer service from Ledger whatsoever. I will be pursuing other wallet options.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Aranza

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected. Beautiful in transparent version.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Whoever complains about how it works should just quit cryptocurrency all together. This is the most simple hardware wallet you can use. instructions are available in the package as well as online, through a Whole playlist of tutorials on the Ledger website. Its a hardware crypto-wallet, not rocket science. Oh, and the tranpsarent version is beautiful! 5 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Unable To Update Firmware
customer_reviews.text: I tried updating the firmware 7 times, each time causing my device to freeze and needing to be recovered-from-pass-phrase. I tried this on a PC (Windows 10) and Mac, and it bombed-out on both. Couldn't find a solution online, and customer support said, that this "comes from a security countermeasure that gets wrongly triggered by something we didn’t pinpoint yet but we suspect it might be the USB stack". I'm sure this is a great product if you don't encounter these issues, but unfortunately I'll have to go with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Puza

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I have been busy since I bought it so I never used it yet. Then the other day I had some time and hooked It Up, but to my dismay it is not working at all. Then when I looked to return it it says that my return cut off was 2 weeks ago. So now it seems I am stuck with a faulty product did I spent $60 on, and can't get my money back. I will not be ordering again unless the person I bought this from makes this right and at that point I will update the review.
customer_reviews.author: BretLeigh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect it to feel like it would break easily.. not much weight to it whatsoever. It’s kind of a pain using the two buttons to scroll or enter the password but overall I’m happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare Configuration
customer_reviews.text: Clunky configuration. Poor instructions. Firmware updates require uninstalling all apps on device, but where is the menu choice to uninstall them? Reconfigure device? What happens to the stored assets? No clue. Option to save logs. And do what with them? Very limited memory. Only room for 4 currencies. Not where I would comfortably keep my assets.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Barney

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I tried to set up my Ledger multiple times, and it never worked. Wasted money.

customer_reviews.text: It can only store 4 apps for different cryptos. Very small memory on device

customer_reviews.text: Worked good for Bitcoin and Litecoin. I thought it would support more coins, but no. A function to sell and trade would really improve this device.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust ! Buy direct.

I contacted their support and they seemed willing to take it back. However I’m still waiting for the shipping label that was promised. I have the transcript of the conversation. Potential for hacking and theft!

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy. Download the software on your Mac or PC and transfer your crypto over. Keep it safe and away from any hackers out there trying to steal your crypto.

customer_reviews.title: A Must have Crypto Currency Wallet
customer_reviews.text: The Ledger Nano S is a must have for your crypto currency storage, The Ledger Nano S is very easy to use very detailed instructions how to set up and use in a matter of 5 mins everyone in my family now owns a Ledger Nano S.

customer_reviews.text: Not quite as easy to use as advertised. Still puzzling through, but I’m older. Set up is straightforward, details on interfacing are not there. Capacity seems to be limited. Questioning this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: For the money it’s a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine. No problems with it. I like how small it is and the color. The software is okay. The interface could look better, but it’s fine.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great wallet. Is small and very safe to store crypto. Highly recommended

customer_reviews.title: Must have for BTC storage
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, not much else to say. It DID actually come with some specs of dirt/scratches on it but turns out that's normal; as long as there's no predetermined seed phrase/PIN, and the app registers it as legit, you should be good to go.

customer_reviews.title: It is good value and it works as designed.
customer_reviews.text: Reliable, easy to use, and good value. It does the job well, without any fancy and unnecessary features.

customer_reviews.title: Product as described
customer_reviews.text: very user friendly and safe to use. 2 step verification every time you use and a lengthy 3 step verification in place in case you ever lose the ledger nano s. Best hardware wallet I've used so far

product_meta.title: Ledger Nano S (Lagoon Blue) -The Best Crypto Hardware Wallet - Secure and Manage your Bitcoin, Ethereum, ERC20 and many other coins
feature_bullets: Cryptocurrency Hardware Wallet: allows you to send and receive crypto assets, securely and conveniently. Your Ledger hardware wallet can easily be connected into a computer and managed through the Ledger Live companion app. The Ledger Nano S keeps your private keys protected
Secure: Your confidential data is never exposed: it is stored inside a strongly isolated Secure Chip, and locked by an 8 digit PIN code
Multicurrency: enables you to manage multiple assets on the same device, and supports over 30 cryptocurrencies and all ERC20 tokens

Easy to use: designed around an intuitive user experience. check and confirm transactions on the built-in display and confirm with using the two physical buttons (anti-malware second factor verification)
Backup & restore: Your accounts are backed up on a recovery sheet, and can easily be restored on any Ledger device or compatible wallet (BIP39/BIP44)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,105 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
